setGameRoot(Group) - Method in class Game.Main
This method is used to set a gameRoot A Game Root is a root node of scene that defines how a game scene should look like This gameRoot is implemented to help users/players to distinguish which game scene they are on The UI is designed by implementing how the gameRoot should look like
setGameScene(Scene) - Method in class Game.Main
This method is used to set a gameScene A Game Scene is a scene that defines the state of the game This method helps in setting which state the player should be in.
